count.description: Number of vectors returned in this response

isTruncated.description: Whether there are more vectors available beyond this response

totalCount.description: Total number of vectors in the index

POST /accounts/{account_id}/vectorize/v2.description: Finds vectors closest to a given vector in an index.

filter.description: A metadata filter expression used to limit nearest neighbor results.

returnMetadata.description: Whether to return no metadata, indexed metadata or all metadata associated with the closest vectors.

returnValues.description: Whether to return the values associated with the closest vectors.

topK.description: The number of nearest neighbors to find.

vector.description: The search vector that will be used to find the nearest neighbors.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Specifies the count of vectors returned by the search

matches.description: Array of vectors matched by the search

score.description: The score of the vector according to the index's distance metric

success.description: Whether the API call was successful
Whether the API call was successful
